channel.title: MoparScape 3.2 w/ Aryan
channel.description:
[img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/pics/moparscapepromo.png[/img]
A picture says a thousand words:
You DO NOT need an ip or to register to play, just click "Start Server": [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/pics/wholeclient.jpg[/img]
Instructions/Features: [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/pics/commandlist.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/pics/keylist.jpg[/img] [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/pics/music.jpg[/img]
Automatically Downloading Cache: [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/pics/cache.jpg[/img]
Sig for those of you who use it and go to other forums (shame :P): [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/pics/moparscapeuserbar.png[/img] code to use for the sig: [code][url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/pics/moparscapeuserbar.png[/img][/url][/code]
And finally, Boring text:
This has a fully functional Aryan built in, you can write your own scripts or download them. This has a fully functional opensource private server (Hybridscape) built in (just click start server and log in). This has a built in mp3 and midi player, and a built in server pinger (to tell you your latency to private servers). This has all the features and functions moparscape has always had, including full camera movement and zoom, maplock, hp over heads, and of course all the DOOM midis :). Built in cache downloader, it only downloads it once so dont worry. Built in clientside item, object and npc changer, fun to play around with. It also shows item and npc ids when you right click, and you can find full lists of them in. Added command to show current position. Connect to any server, and port. Console is built in and hideable. This works great in linux or windows, includes all .bat and .sh files you need.
new in 3.2:
An item/object/npc viewer that allows you to search for what you want. More streamlined, autoupdating, windows installer, and no need for .bat files.
I used so much code that I didnt originally write in this client I cant even remember it all, all of it had to be extensivly changed so I didnt rip it, just used it as a starting point, here I will attempt to list who's code I used, if I didnt get you just post and I will ammend it: RegeX, frank_, kryptizzler, winterlove (wL), hybridscape dev team, and the aryan dev team. Thanks to Vipsta for the graphics. I didnt obfuscate this on purpose, just please dont be a douche and release as your own with no credit ;)
download away: (if this link takes you to download Moparscape 3.1, then refresh your browser)
[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html][size=50pt]CLICK HERE TO DOWNLOAD MOPARSCAPE[/size][/url]
download the zip file for linux/mac [url=http://rapidshare.com/files/152742190/MoparScape.zip.html]here[/url] (note this is the same, but you have to extract it yourself)
check some of these problems and answers: [quote="moparisthebest"][quote author=mehaku link=topic=6915.msg70800#msg70800 date=1153217492] wait, now i cant start my own server because this starts on 0.0.0.0:93594....how can i change it?? [/quote]
it is supposed to do that
[quote author=bigal link=topic=6915.msg71004#msg71004 date=1153229525] the download link only gives me moperscape2.1 [/quote]
refresh your browser
[quote author=dlong link=topic=6915.msg71131#msg71131 date=1153235491] hey how do you edit your game when u got it?? plz tell me becuz i got it.... But theres like not any monsters tell me how to plz!! [/quote]
check they hybridscape folder, its opensource[/quote] [quote="moparisthebest"][quote author=killaZ link=topic=6915.msg72503#msg72503 date=1153283403] when i click on run.bot it says java.lang.noClassDefFoundError: bot Press any key to continue . . . _
Then I do and it then the box exits and nothing happens..can some1 tell me what to do i gotta go in 3 mins!! [/quote]
extract the WHOLE archive into its own folder first[/quote] [quote="moparisthebest"]If all of you dont stop spamming I will lock this thread
if it says somthing about stringbuilder, install the latest java
if it says java is not a recoginzed command or somthing, uninstall then reinstall java, you DO NOT HAVE IT SET UP CORRECTLY
you can have others connect to this server if you forward your ports and/or give people your ip address
you can replace the server with whatever you want, and/or modify it all you need to, its open source[/quote] [quote="sonic_dude"]ok, heres what you do, click the lnk mopar gave you, and at the top it says " click to download here, here,here,or here,
click the second "Here" and download it to your desktop, you should see somthing like this:
[img]http://img53.imageshack.us/img53/4947/helpingyouqi5.png[/img]
then right click it and click:
[img]http://img53.imageshack.us/img53/2980/helpingyou2ew5.png[/img]
then you will see somthing like this:
[img]http://img53.imageshack.us/img53/2174/helping2jv4.png[/img]
so double click that, and youll see somthing like this:
[IMG]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v336/jamescramer/ghghghg.jpg[/img]
just double click that and wait, it should load in the next 5 seconds[/quote]

item.title: MoparScape 3.2 w/ Aryan

@hellhawk4ever wrote:

Look around at the different servers and builds on the forums here. I’m sure you’ll find what you’re looking for

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape 3.2 w/ Aryan
item.dc:creator: @des627 des627
item.description:
@des627 wrote:

[quote=“hellhawk4ever, post:3661, topic:5265”]SOLVED!!!

tl;dr: It’s missing the cache files and the auto loader won’t fetch it.

[ol][li]Download here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip
[/li][li]Extract the contents of the zip in its entirety to the following directory: C:.mpr_file_store_32 (Accept any overwrites)
[/li][li]Start the game with either the .jar or .bat
[/li][/ol]

Long version:

I decided to use GeForces built-in ShadowPlay, which captures the last 5 minutes of desktop activity. I opened the recording in VLC media player and went frame by frame the second or two that the client was open to view the write output command prompt of the client. It looked to me that it was attempting to load a cache.zip file from a location on the net, and that’s where the client terminated. So, I searched “cache” in the Moparscape download megathread. Sure enough, others were having the same issue, and I also came across the download link for the cache. After downloading the zip, I extracted the contents to the mpr file storage location, and sure enough it worked.

Please share this with anyone trying to play moparscape from now on![/quote]

Great job finding this. Not sure why the people in charge couldn’t just have put it in here. Took you to find this and give the answer. They should change your name to “hellhawk4ever-isthebest”.

And after all that it is not as wonderful as I had hoped. It is ok, and nice to have all in one easy GUI, but, I would like more details on how to change things in the server. Especially how to change what your stats are on start, and items. I will figure it out eventually. I am more looking for a RSPS that has all the population setup like the real runescape server. Not sure if there is anything out there like that. And would like to see construction working as well.

I will keep playing on this some as well as a few others. Thanks again!

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape 3.2 w/ Aryan
item.dc:creator: @hellhawk4ever hellhawk4ever
item.description:
@hellhawk4ever wrote:

SOLVED!!!

tl;dr: It’s missing the cache files and the auto loader won’t fetch it.

[ol][li]Download here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/cache/cache.zip
[/li][li]Extract the contents of the zip in its entirety to the following directory: C:.mpr_file_store_32 (Accept any overwrites)
[/li][li]Start the game with either the .jar or .bat
[/li][/ol]

Long version:

I decided to use GeForces built-in ShadowPlay, which captures the last 5 minutes of desktop activity. I opened the recording in VLC media player and went frame by frame the second or two that the client was open to view the write output command prompt of the client. It looked to me that it was attempting to load a cache.zip file from a location on the net, and that’s where the client terminated. So, I searched “cache” in the Moparscape download megathread. Sure enough, others were having the same issue, and I also came across the download link for the cache. After downloading the zip, I extracted the contents to the mpr file storage location, and sure enough it worked.

Please share this with anyone trying to play moparscape from now on!

Read full topic

item.title: MoparScape 3.2 w/ Aryan
item.dc:creator: @Tovagulet Tovagulet
item.description:
@Tovagulet wrote:

[size=14pt]IF YOU CAN’T LOG IN, READ THIS [FIX][/size]

When you use the auto-installer the program by default will install in C:\Program Files\Moparscape

You have to move the Moparscape folder to the desktop, documents, downloads or root of your HDD/SSD or wherever you want, but not in the program files or anything that requieres permissions. Because to run things installed in Program Files you need admin access, since “Starting server” doesn’t have admin access, it can’t actually start the server, but once you move it to somewhere else, it will start working.

You can even put it in C:\Moparscape and it will work.

Read full topic

item.description:
@birdboy wrote:

sort of irrelevant to this server / client in general but more of a I have a question and can’t seem to find an answer to.
So, basically, i’ve been away from this whole deal for about 4 years, I remember a bit of what i was doing but not enough to run my server. I notice now that any of the source + clients i download all have SQL for setting up…anything. I have only extremely basic database knowledge and was wondering if this is the norm now or is there something i’ve been missing. if this is the way it’s run now, are there tutorials to edit the SQL so you can run these servers?

item.title: MoparScape 3.2 w/ Aryan
item.dc:creator: @screamingismyair screamingismyair
item.description:
@screamingismyair wrote:

[quote=“ashley12364, post:3646, topic:5265”]Registering user ashleyyy with pass ashley
Server: hybridscape Server (2): Exception!
Server: ClientHandler: Client ashleyyy disconnected.
[05:53:18] Couldn’t open output stream to log file ashleyyy-20141116.log
[05:53:18]
[05:53:18] Logging into (ashleyyy, *****)
[05:53:18] Your UID is: 35954675
Server: ClientHandler: Accepted from 127.0.0.1:51189
Did not save for ashleyyy

i start the server and then try to log in and this is all i keep getting, no matter what username and password i enter and how many times i press login, any help will be grateful.[/quote]

it looks like you are having access problems, and its not getting access to write to the file.
You should probably try right clicking run as admin. or figure out why its not letting it write to the file to save your character.

item.title: MoparScape 3.2 w/ Aryan
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

The Moparscape client has almost no use it is a legacy item more than anything. If you wish to be an owner on a server head to the Downloads Section, find your self a good looking source and download it (preferrable one with a client included), If you get one with an auto cache downloader, you will probably need to perform extra steps before you can play it.
Compile and run the server, and then the client. If you do not have JDK, check the server help section for the sticky post that can help with this.

Read full topic
